learly state that there *are* IANA unregistered
media types, where is it st=
ated that  other parties can't have the
initiative of designing and maintai=
n a regstry of the media types they
designed?

If this was AAA many many ti=
mes, it would be easy for you to enlight me,
rigth?

If you desire to create some alternate registry,=
